entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishItemsOutputGroup target is missing some outputs published by ComputeFilesToPublish #42255
  • Support/generate shell completions for fig #42254
  • Improve the workload template experience #42253
  • .NET8 SDK error: GC heap initialization failed with error 0x8007000E #42252
  • NuGet Runtime pack for community-supported architectures #42248

Closed

  • dotnet add package stops checking sources on the first failure http code #42245

PullRequests

Created

  • Support AdditionalMSBuildParameters #42251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stable sort workloads list #42247
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Removed Microsoft.DotNet.Tools.Tests.Utilities #42241
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .editorconfig template with new defaults #42059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update .gdnbaselines in VMR #42246
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement Channel Concept in dotnet test #42233
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Onboard Installer core-sdk-tasks tests to Helix #42243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automated test to verify that the custom culture is respected #42174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report better error when `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package is not downloaded #42216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package description #42212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Spike #42240
